sn37.3:1.1: “Mendicants, there are these five kinds of suffering that particularly apply to ladies. They’re undergone by ladies and not by men.
sn37.3:1.3: Firstly, a lady, while still young, goes to live with her husband’s family and is separated from her relatives.
sn37.3:1.4: This is the first kind of suffering that particularly applies to ladies.
sn37.3:1.5: Furthermore, a lady undergoes the menstrual cycle.
sn37.3:1.6: This is the second kind of suffering that particularly applies to ladies.
sn37.3:1.8: This is the third kind of suffering that particularly applies to ladies.
sn37.3:1.10: This is the fourth kind of suffering that particularly applies to ladies.
sn37.3:1.11: Furthermore, a lady provides services for a man.
sn37.3:1.12: This is the fifth kind of suffering that particularly applies to ladies.
sn37.3:1.13: These are the five kinds of suffering that particularly apply to ladies. They’re undergone by ladies and not by men.”
